oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Orpy star Spectacular at the Macon City Auditorium
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Wagoner, Porter; Price, Ray, 1926-2013;Pearl, Minnie;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing the Grand Ole Opry Spectacular show featuring Flatt and Scruggs, Ray Price, Minnie Pearl, Grandpa Jones, and Porter Wagoner at the Macon City Auditorium on January 28. Poster features a metal photoplate of Flatt and Scruggs, Ray Price, Minnie Pearl, Grandpa Jones, and Porter Wagoner.
